original_solution_mapping.L1: He will use $250 in fuel because 5 x 50 = <<5*50=250>>250
original_solution_mapping.L2: He will be shark hunting for 300 minutes because 5 x 60 = <<5*60=300>>300
original_solution_mapping.L3: He can expect to see 30 sharks because 300 / 10 = <<300/10=30>>30
original_solution_mapping.L4: He will make $450 off these photos because 30 x 15 = <<30*15=450>>450

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3479.
    Returns: the profit Pat can expect to make.
    """
    # L1
    hunting_hours = 5 # shark hunts for 5 hours
    fuel_cost_per_hour = 50 # boat fuel costs $50 an hour
    total_fuel_cost = hunting_hours * fuel_cost_per_hour

    # L2
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    total_hunting_minutes = hunting_hours * minutes_per_hour

    # L3
    time_per_shark = 10 # sees a shark about every 10 minutes
    num_sharks_seen = total_hunting_minutes / time_per_shark

    # L4
    earnings_per_photo = 15 # For every photo he takes he earns $15
    total_earnings_from_photos = num_sharks_seen * earnings_per_photo

    # L5
    profit = total_earnings_from_photos - total_fuel_cost

    # FA
    answer = profit
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He will use $250 in fuel because {hunting_hours} x {fuel_cost_per_hour} = <<{hunting_hours}*{fuel_cost_per_hour}={total_fuel_cost}>>{total_fuel_cost}
He will be shark hunting for {total_hunting_minutes} minutes because {hunting_hours} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{hunting_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_hunting_minutes}>>{total_hunting_minutes}
He can expect to see {num_sharks_seen} sharks because {total_hunting_minutes} / {time_per_shark} = <<{total_hunting_minutes}/{time_per_shark}={num_sharks_seen}>>{num_sharks_seen}

He will make ${total_earnings_from_photos} off these photos because {num_sharks_seen} x {earnings_per_photo} = <<{num_sharks_seen}*{earnings_per_photo}={total_earnings_from_photos}>>{total_earnings_from_photos}
He will make ${profit} in profit because {total_earnings_from_photos} - {total_fuel_cost} = <<{total_earnings_from_photos}-{total_fuel_cost}={profit}>>{profit}

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_hunting_minutes' (value: 300) was used instead of 'num_sharks_seen' (value: 30.0).
